component.text: Enable OSPFv3 on the R2 and R3 Interfaces

component.feedback: ***You must enter the exact and full command.***
component.existingcommands:
Enable OSPFv3 for process ID 10 area 0 on interfaces in the following order:
  • GigabitEthernet0/0
  • Serial0/0/0
  • Serial0/0/1
  • Return to privileged EXEC mode

command.deviceresponse:
R2#
*Mar 29 12:54:26.143: %OSPFv3-5-ADJCHG: Process 10, Nbr 1.1.1.1 on Serial0/0/0 from LOADING to FULL, Loading Done
R2#
command.instruction: Display the brief listing of the interfaces participating in OSPFv3.

command.deviceresponse:
Interface PID Area Intf ID Cost State Nbrs F/C
Se0/0/1 10 0 7 647 P2P 0/0
Se0/0/0 10 0 6 647 P2P 1/1
Gi0/0 10 0 3 10 DR 0/0
R2#
command.instruction:
You are now configuring router R3. Enable OSPFv3 for process ID 10 area 0 on interfaces in the following order:
  • GigabitEthernet0/0
  • Serial0/0/0
  • Serial0/0/1
  • Return to privileged EXEC mode

command.deviceresponse:
R3#
*Mar 29 12:59:44.978: %OSPFv3-5-ADJCHG: Process 10, Nbr 1.1.1.1 on Serial0/0/0 from LOADING to FULL, Loading Done
*Mar 29 12:59:45.322: %OSPFv3-5-ADJCHG: Process 10, Nbr 2.2.2.2 on Serial0/0/1 from LOADING to FULL, Loading Done
R3#
command.instruction: Display the brief listing of the interfaces participating in OSPFv3.

command.deviceresponse:
Interface PID Area Intf ID Cost State Nbrs F/C
Se0/0/1 10 0 7 647 P2P 1/1
Se0/0/0 10 0 6 647 P2P 1/1
Gi0/0 10 0 3 10 DR 0/0
R3#
command.instruction: You successfully enabled OSPFv3 on the R2 and R3 interfaces.
